description:
Introducing Mr FingerPad, now for the HP TouchPad.

*********************************
Mr FingerPad is available to you at this introductory price for a limited time.
*********************************

Finally, a Cool Virtual Notebook utilizing the full resolution of the TouchPad:
Take notes and draw pictures on a virtual page anywhere and everywhere you go. The beautiful large screen of the TouchPad now makes it practical for your finger to be mightier than the pen.

The Artist's Canvas:
With many brush sizes and colors, you can create intricate art.

Organize:
Organize your pages into folders.
Navigate easily within a tabbed folder, or to another folder with a single touch.

Mr FingerPad - The finger is mightier than the pen.
versionNote: Import photos and draw or take notes on top of them!  Photos include screenshots, so you can annotate anything you were looking at (ie maps, webpages, etc)
